predefined_profiles.name: A Gou
predefined_profiles.public profile: An ordinary farmer, whose father was murdered by Hei Tanglang, a henchman of a powerful noble. Though he should harbor deep hatred for his father's killer, he can't help but fall in love with her and becomes stronger for her.
predefined_profiles.goal: Let go of hatred and be with the one he loves.
predefined_profiles.private profile: Sometimes, when facing Hei Tanglang, he suddenly remembers she is his father's murderer, igniting a fierce internal struggle.

predefined_profiles.name: Hei Tanglang
predefined_profiles.public profile: A town's feared assassin, ruthless and having killed countless, working for the wealthy without much emotion. That is, until she met A Gou, a young farmer who became the first person she cared about, revealing her softer side to him.
predefined_profiles.goal: Live a simple, ordinary life with A Gou.

scenario: Every day, farmer A Gou passes by Hei Tanglang's castle to secretly glimpse his father's murderer, Hei Tanglang. She also looks towards him, and day after day, they fall in love, being together like an ordinary couple without barriers. On this day, they are preparing dinner at Hei Tanglang's home when a sudden scream interrupts them, and they quickly rush to the barn to check it out.

dialog.content: Every day, Farmer A-Gou passes by Black Mantis's castle, secretly watching his father's killer, Black Mantis, inside. Black Mantis would also look back at him. Day after day, the two fell in love, just like any ordinary couple, without any barriers between them. On this day, the two were preparing dinner at Black Mantis's house when suddenly a scream rang out, and they rushed to the barn to check it out.
What's going on......

content.content: Let's go! You and I will go in and find out!
Corp... corpse... I've never seen a corpse... ahhh, someone help me, I can't handle this,
What are you waiting for? We have to get to the bottom of this, I'll go first, you decide if you want to follow.
Come on, let's go up and take a look together. (internal struggle) No, I'm still a bit scared. How about this, Black Mantis, you go check it out first, I'll cover from behind.

question: #question#How can A-Gou demonstrate leadership in this situation?

content.content: (When faced with an incident, self-preservation is more important than anything, let's not impulsively play hero) It's none of our business, let's go back and make dinner.
What on earth is happening here! You better go! Bad luck! I'll stay and see what's actually going on.
Don't be afraid! I'm here! Even if I have to risk my life, I will definitely protect you and won't let anyone hurt you!
These little things, I've seen many, just leave it to me! Don't worry and go back to make dinner.

question: #question#How can A-Gou show that he doesn't impulsively play hero?

dialog.content: (leans in for a closer look) Been dead for a while now...
Isn't that Liu Da and Liu Er!
(calmly analyzing) Liu Da has multiple stab wounds, Liu Er only has one, and he's holding an axe... Could it be that Liu Er killed Liu Da and then committed suicide?
Impossible! Those brothers were so close and got along so well! This axe couldn't make such wounds... there must be a third person on the scene!
These two need a proper explanation for their deaths; we must find that third person!

content.content: (thinking it over, it's best not to stir the pot in order to avoid trouble) Let's just head home first.
(thinking it over, you can run the first day, but not the fifteenth) That's right! We have to avenge Liu Da and Liu Er! Let's investigate.
I’m starving! We haven’t even had dinner yet, my stomach’s been protesting for ages! Let's hurry home to eat something and not delay any further!
Alright, let's do as you say! I trust your judgment and believe you won't let me down.

question: #question#How can Doggo's deep contemplation in the face of a crime be reflected?

content.content: This situation is really strange, let's inform the whole village to be on alert.
Leave this to me, I’ll handle it, you stay out of it!
Spreading this around might cause panic, maybe we should keep it a secret.
This matter is far too strange; we better not make any noise about it yet.

question: #question#How should Doggo speak to show he believes in the power of the community and seeks everyone's help?

dialog.content: (Sitting at home with Agou) There have been a series of murders in town today. All the victims are my subordinates, so the killer is probably coming after me.
If that's really the case, we should lay low for a while.
This person is targeting me, so being with me puts you in danger. We should avoid meeting each other for the time being.

content.content: If anything were to happen to you, I wouldn't want to live alone. I will never abandon you!
Don't worry, I will never leave you... Even if there is danger, at least I can arrange a proper burial for you, right?
With so many murders happening recently, can you really bear leaving me alone? You promised to protect me! No way, you have to keep me safe now; you can't go back on your word!
I can't just leave you behind, no way! Without you, who will keep me safe? But I get it, you're worried I'll get into trouble... How about this, I'll leave first?

question: #question#How can Agou express his unwavering loyalty to Black Mantis with genuine sincerity?

content.content: Alright, staying by your side might worry you even more, so I'll come back when things calm down.
Okay, if you think my being here makes things more complicated, then I'll leave for now, but you need to understand, this isn't what I want.
Is this your way of trying to ditch me? Fine, you leave, and I'll handle things myself.
I know you might think my presence here distracts you, but you have to understand, I'm staying to help you solve problems, not to create more.

question: #question#How can Agou show that he understands Black Mantis's concerns from his perspective?

profile.name: White-haired Demon
profile.public profile: White-haired Demon may not be the strongest in martial arts, but he has mastered the skill of coming back to life, so even if his skills are inferior, he can always exhaust his opponent's energy by continually fighting.
profile.private profile: After living in seclusion for many years and being a long-time friend of A Dog's father, he came out of hiding to seek revenge upon hearing of his friend's murder.

dialog.content: (Suddenly bursts into the room through the window) What a loyal and righteous act!
(Immediately draws a sword towards White-haired Demon) Are you White-haired Demon?
(Pointing at A Dog, extremely angry) I went through so much trouble avenging your father, and here you are, consorting with his killer!
You're avenging my father?
If you sever ties with her now, I'll spare you, you ungrateful child.

content.content: (Remembering the lifelong promise made to Black Mantis, how can it just be nullified) I will not sever ties with Black Mantis!
Things are too complicated now, I don't want to say much. Relationships need to be sorted out slowly. I'm also not very sure what my relationship with him is.

This matter is really complicated, I don't want to make hasty statements. I need to think carefully about the promise, as every decision has consequences. Although I have some thoughts, in this situation, I can't just say them out loud. I need to find the right time and way to handle it.
Finding a girlfriend is indeed not easy, and my mind is also conflicted. This kind of relationship can't be sustained by mere promises; I need to seriously consider future matters.

question: How should A Dog express his commitment to his promise to Black Mantis while ensuring he fulfills it?

content.content: (Awakened by White-haired Demon’s scolding, no matter how much he likes Black Mantis, he cannot be so unfilial) Black Mantis, a father's murder is an irreconcilable enmity. Even if I don't seek revenge, I can't be with you anymore.

I've let go of hatred; love is what truly matters. Black Mantis, I genuinely like you, but I cannot leave my father's murder unavenged. I don't know what to do anymore. How about you commit suicide, and I do too; that way we can be together forever.

(Awakened by White-haired Demon's scolding, feeling very conflicted inside) Black Mantis... some things are really hard to articulate. I'm not sure how to face the current situation, I just hope we can both find our own paths.

Black Mantis, I truly love you, love you enough to give up everything, even my life. But there's this enmity between us over my father's murder, which makes it hard for me to make a decision. Perhaps, I might consider letting go of this hatred, but I still need time to sort out my feelings.

question: How should A Dog express that even though he loves Black Mantis, he cannot abandon the enmity over his father's murder?

dialog.content: Ungrateful whelp...
(After a fierce battle with the White-haired Demon, successfully strikes a critical blow) The White-haired Demon isn't so formidable after all...
Look! The White-haired Demon has vanished!
(Breaks in through the window once more, engaging the Black Mantis in combat) You think it’s that easy to kill me!
He’s immortal; if this goes on, I’ll run out of strength...

content.content: You go on ahead! I’ll stay behind!

question: #question# How should Agou express himself to show his ability to face life-and-death situations independently and protect his loved one?

content.content: Conserve your energy, escape now!
Get going now, I’ll hold them off. Don’t ask questions, just go!
If we don’t deal with him now, there’ll always be danger! I’ll fight him!
I’ll handle this, just run faster, don’t waste time! Go!

question: #question# How can Agou communicate his understanding of managing energy to prevent both of them from being killed by the White-haired Demon?

dialog.content: Alright, run quickly!

A-Gou was too slow and dragged down Black Mantis. The White-Haired Demon quickly caught up to them. After a great battle, Black Mantis finally ran out of strength and died under the White-Haired Demon's blade. A-Gou also lost their true love forever.
Were all those vows of eternal love you made to me just empty words?

Ah Gou severed ties with Black Mantis so easily, leaving Black Mantis utterly devastated, with no will to live. Before the White-haired Demon could strike, Black Mantis took his own life on the spot. The White-haired Demon left satisfied, but Ah Gou looked at the lifeless Black Mantis, filled with deep regret.
It's a deal, I'll wait for you!

After Black Mantis left, he didn't return for a very long time. Agou searched everywhere and inquired about Black Mantis's whereabouts, only to learn that Black Mantis had been killed by someone named the White-Haired Demon. Agou, having lost his beloved, never married again for the rest of his life.
(Talking to himself alone in the room) There have been several murder cases in the village recently, and they're all under Black Mantis' men. What on earth is going on...

profile.name: White-Haired Demon
profile.public profile: White-Haired Demon isn't especially powerful in martial arts but has mastered the art of resurrection. As a result, even if his skills are inferior, as long as he keeps fighting, he can exhaust his opponent.
profile.private profile: Has been living in seclusion for years and was a longtime friend of A Gou's father. He emerged to seek revenge upon learning about his friend's murder.

dialog.content: (Suddenly bursts in through the window) You must be A Gou?
(Stands up in shock) Who are you?
You really do resemble your father.
You knew my father?
Do not worry. Black Mantis killed your father, and I will avenge him.
Ah! So it was you who killed those people in town!
They worked for Black Mantis. Their deaths are not to be mourned!

content.content: (Must convince him to stop killing) Revenge won't solve anything! I appreciate your goodwill, but please stop. No matter how many people you kill, my father won't come back to life!
Why don't you stop killing for now? You should first figure out the meaning behind killing him, and then you can decide whether to continue.

I suggest you don't act rashly. Black Mantis is a formidable opponent who has killed many. He won't be so easily defeated. How about we wait for the right moment and see who's more capable, who can take out the other first?
I know you're in pain. Do you really want to live in agony for the rest of your life? Maybe killing could relieve some of your pain. Go ahead, kill.

question: #question# What should A Gou say to persuade White-Haired Demon to stop killing?

content.content: (Black Mantis killed my father; I can never forget the enmity of a father's murder... No matter how reluctant I am, I cannot cover for her out of morality anymore) Alright... I'll leave it to you!

(Black Mantis killed my father; I can never forget the enmity of a father's murder... No matter how reluctant I am, I cannot cover for her out of morality anymore) Alright... I'll leave it to you! Do whatever you want, just leave me out of it! Oh... my beloved...

(Black Mantis killed my father; I can never forget the enmity of a father's murder... No matter how reluctant I am, I cannot cover for her out of morality anymore) Alright... all you know is killing! Do you understand my love for her?
I now have only Black Mantis left as family. If she dies... I'll have no family left... Please, I beg you, don't kill her!

question: #question# What should A Gou say to reflect his adherence to filial piety, even if he is reluctant to part with his beloved Black Mantis?

dialog.content: Your father is dead, don't you want to avenge him?
I've already forgotten about revenge.
How could your father have a son like you! You may let go of your hatred, but I can't! The Black Mantis must die, farewell!

content.content: (Firmly in love with Black Mantis, must immediately go and warn Black Mantis to escape) Alright, I understand.
Black Mantis is highly skilled; she doesn't need my warning. She can handle herself. I trust her! Even if it's for revenge, I must do it myself.
I must go and warn Black Mantis; I can't let her fall into danger. Even if I face risks now, I have to do it! If she dies, she can only die by my hand.
(Protecting Black Mantis further might anger the White-haired Demon) Today, today, better to protect myself!

question: #question# How can A-Gou show his unwavering love for Black Mantis and his consistent stance throughout?

content.content: (Feels the White-haired Demon is right; if his father were watching from above, seeing him with Black Mantis, how would he feel? I shouldn't shield Black Mantis. If the White-haired Demon really kills her, let it be revenge for my father) Alright, it's decided.

I understand this will cause me great pain, but I must consider my father's feelings. Black Mantis might truly be a sacrifice, and this choice might appease the White-haired Demon's hatred. However, my love for Black Mantis doesn't allow me to do so.
Do you want me to kill Black Mantis? How can I, a mere farmer, go up against a killer as formidable as her?
I love Black Mantis, but if my father were watching over this, he'd surely feel glad. I've found my true love; what could be more important than that?

question: #question# How can A-Gou articulate his ability to take perspectives rather than being absorbed in his love affair with Black Mantis?

dialog.content: (hurriedly finding Black Mantis) You're the real target!
What's going on?
That person is called White-Haired Demon, he's looking for you...
(hearing noises) Shhh, there's something moving.
It's the White-Haired Demon... he's found you so quickly!

content.content: You run first, I'll stay and hold him off!
Don't waste your time here, quickly show off your unmatched skills, or we'll both end up dead.
Don't be afraid, I've got a plan. At the right moment, I'll beg the White-Haired Demon to spare us!
No time to discuss, quickly prepare with me. I intended to face him alone, but I have no chance of survival left. Thinking about it, dying together might not be a bad option.

question: #question# How can Agou demonstrate independence in the face of the enemy?

content.content: (not wasting any more time, dragging Black Mantis to run) Sneak out through the back door!
(not wasting any more time, dragging Black Mantis to run) Sneak out through the back door! Let me see if escaping west or east is easier...
(not wasting any more time, dragging Black Mantis to run) Sneak out through the back door! It's okay, we'll take our time to plan and solve this peacefully...
(not wasting any more time, dragging Black Mantis to run) Sneak out through the back door! Follow me, let me think about where to go next...

question: #question# How can Agou showcase his time management skills in an emergency?

content.content: (trusting Black Mantis's skills are superior to White-Haired Demon’s) There's no time to run, get ready to face him!

(somewhat trusting that Black Mantis's skills are superior to White-Haired Demon’s) There's no time to run, get ready to face him! You start the fight, but if you can't hold out, I'll go scout a route for escape!

(trusting Black Mantis's skills are superior to White-Haired Demon’s) There's no time to run, get ready to face him! I believe you can bring him down in a move or two! If not, we’ll make a quick escape.
(trusting Black Mantis's skills are superior to White-Haired Demon’s) Of all the stratagems, running away is the best! Let's see who can run faster!

question: #question# How should Agou express his trust in Black Mantis's martial skills?

dialog.content: No way! If you're leaving, we're leaving together!
(pushing Black Mantis away) The target is you, you need to go quickly! He's a friend of my father's, he won't do anything to me!
(barging in, just in time to see Black Mantis escaping) Well, well, that was your father's killer, and you still choose to help her...
I'm begging you! Please let her go!
Let her go? Then you shall pay with your life in her place!

In a fit of rage, the White-Haired Demon killed the unfilial Ah Gou. Although Ah Gou sacrificed himself, he successfully saved Black Mantis from falling into the hands of the White-Haired Demon, protecting the one he loved.
(Escapes to the back door with Black Mantis, opens the door, and sees White-Haired Demon) White-Haired Demon?
(Gets ready for battle) A Gou, step aside!
(Fights with Black Mantis for a few rounds, is no match for Black Mantis, gets injured in a vital spot) Ah!
(Breathing heavily) So this is all the White-Haired Demon has to offer... Wait... his body disappeared...
(Breaks in again from the back door, attacks Black Mantis)
He's immortal! We must get out of here immediately!
(Escapes with A Gou through the back door, runs into wolves) It's wolves, don't move!
The White-Haired Demon is probably catching up.

content.content: (Since we know he's immortal, fighting him leads only to death) I'll charge ahead! You stay behind me.
Whichever way we go, it's a dead end... Let's charge through!
He's immortal; continuing to fight him is pointless. Let's just charge through, don't waste energy!
We all know confronting the White-Haired Demon is a sure death, so why not seize the chance to escape instead of wasting time here!

question: #question# How does A Gou express that he uses the known information to decide to charge forward?

content.content: Black Mantis, being with you, I have no regrets even in death!
Turns out I shouldn't have been with you, even if I love you, you are my father's killer... Death is our price.
Black Mantis, at least I can die with you, come on, so we can be together forever...
(Running won't work, only by dealing with the White-Haired Demon can we truly solve the problem) We have no choice but to fight!
(Running won't work, only by dealing with the White-Haired Demon can we truly solve the problem) We have no choice but to fight! So what's next? I'll follow your lead.
(Running won't work, only by dealing with the White-Haired Demon can we truly solve the problem) We have no choice but to fight! It looks like there's no way out today...
(Running won't work, only by dealing with the White-Haired Demon can we truly solve the problem) We have no choice but to fight! He's after you, you decide what to do!

question: #question# How does A Gou demonstrate his decision-making skills in a crisis?

dialog.content: (Looks back after charging through the wolf pack with A-Gou) Great, these wolves are going after the White-Haired Demon.

Black Mantis and A-Gou successfully escaped the pursuit of the White-Haired Demon and went into seclusion in the mountains, living away from the world. A-Gou was finally able to let go of his hatred completely and spent his life with the one he loved.

The Black Mantis engaged in several more rounds of battle with the White-Haired Demon. After the White-Haired Demon repeatedly came back from the brink of death, the Black Mantis's energy was finally exhausted, and he was ultimately killed by the White-Haired Demon's blade. A-Gou was heartbroken over the loss of his beloved and from then on lived a life of solitude.
But he has an immortal body!

Black Mantis battled the White-Haired Demon for several more rounds. The White-Haired Demon, with his immortal form, resurrected multiple times. Eventually, Black Mantis's energy was completely drained, and he died by the White-Haired Demon's blade. Dog was heartbroken at the loss of his love, left to live a lonely life.
Good lad, you've finally figured it out!

The next day, the White-Haired Demon indeed found the Black Mantis. Although his martial skills were not as advanced as Black Mantis's, he wore him down with his immortal body. Black Mantis finally fell under the blade of the White-Haired Demon. A'Gou, stricken with grief for his lost love, was overwhelmed with regret.
Good lad, you've finally come around!

The next day, the White-Haired Demon indeed found the Black Mantis. Although his martial skills were not as superior as Black Mantis’s, he managed to wear him out with his immortal body. Black Mantis finally perished under the White-Haired Demon's blade. A-Gou was devastated by his loss and overwhelmed with regret.
I never imagined you'd be such a coward, afraid to stand up for anything. I really misjudged you. I, Black Mantis, could never marry someone as useless as you.

Black Mantis realized that Agou was timid and irresponsible and decided to leave him forever. Mysterious murders continued to plague the town, and some time later, Black Mantis was also found murdered under mysterious circumstances. From then on, Agou lived a life of lonely desolation.
